dct_title_s: Nova Anglia, Novum Belgium, et Virginia
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Title in heart-shaped cartouche in upper left of map. Text in German on verso: New Belgica, und New Anglia. Signature: BBb. Catchword: New. Probably issued in: Newer Atlas ... Amsterdam : H. Hondius, 1638. The map was issued in editions of the Newer Atlas of 1638, 1642, 1644 and 1647. cf. Burden, P. The mapping of North America.
